section.title: DESCRIPTION
section.p: The dbi_admin interface is designed for administrating SQL databases. It presents a generic api to create and drop databases.

commanddef.desc: open the given 'database'. Extra arguments can (must) be given, depending on the backend used. database is an identifier of the database. What this is exactly, can depend on the implementation This is method the same as the one defined by dbi interface.
create a database identified by database
